heroSubtitle: Mirador Business Center - 191 sqm of Modern Living
descriptionBody: Discover this stunning 3-bedroom apartment located in the prestigious Mirador Business Center, in the heart of Aveiro. Offering a generous 191 sqm of meticulously designed living space, this property seamlessly combines luxury, comfort, and an unbeatable central location. Enjoy breathtaking panoramic views and convenient access to all city amenities, including shops, restaurants, and cultural attractions. Key features include spacious living and dining areas, three well-appointed bedrooms (one en-suite), modern bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with high-end appliances, and premium finishes throughout. Abundant natural light floods the interiors, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. This apartment is perfect for families seeking a sophisticated urban lifestyle or as a prime investment opportunity in one of Aveiro's most sought-after addresses.
specsValueParking: Closed garage (2 cars) + 1 exterior parking space
specsValueFeatures: Central heating, air conditioning, built-in wardrobes, double glazing, balcony with city views, video intercom.
locationAddress: Address: Rua Cristóvão Pinho Queimado, nº 64, 3800-170 Aveiro, Portugal
locationDescription: Situated in the vibrant Mirador Business Center, this property offers unparalleled access to Aveiro's canals, university, shopping centers, and public transport. Experience the best of city living with tranquility and convenience.
contactSubtitle: Interested in this property? Contact us for more information or to schedule a viewing.
footerText: © 2025 Mirador Business Center. All rights reserved.

Home.title: Welcome to Mirador Business Center
Home.description: Find your new home in the heart of Aveiro. Luxury 3-bedroom apartment with 191 sqm, 3 bedrooms (1 en-suite), 3 bathrooms, garage for 2 cars, and stunning views.
